EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Initial Iron Smelting Area at (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of two stone furnaces used for initial iron plate production:
- First furnace at (0.0, 0.0)
- Second furnace at (2.0, 0.0)

### Automated Iron Mining & Smelting System at (-18.0, -49.0) and (-15.0, -50.0)
Two complete mining setups:

First Setup:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -49.0)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -47.5)
- Wooden chest at (-15.5, -47.5) containing iron ore and plates

Second Setup:
- Burner mining drill at (-15.0, -50.0)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -48.5)
- Wooden chest at (-12.5, -48.5) containing iron ore and plates

### Copper Mining and Processing System
Mining Setup:
- Two burner mining drills at (-28.0, -61.0) and (-28.0, -63.0)
- Mining inserters at (-25.5, -60.5) and (-25.5, -62.5)

Smelting Setup:
- Two stone furnaces at (-27.0, -56.0) and (-27.0, -53.0)
- Output inserters at (-25.5, -55.5) and (-25.5, -52.5)
- Output chests at (-24.5, -55.5) and (-24.5, -52.5) containing copper plates

Transport System:
- Direct transport belt paths connecting mining inserters to furnaces
- Simplified parallel transport lines for ore movement

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones at a position
- Ensure proper spacing between entities, especially for inserters
- When rebuilding systems, completely clean up old entities first

### Code-Related Errors
- Import and define required classes (BurnerMiningDrill, etc.) before using them
- Initialize variables before accessing their attributes
- Handle null/None values properly before accessing their properties

### Resource Management
- Check inventory capacity before inserting items
- Verify fuel levels in burner entities
- Handle "inventory full" scenarios when inserting fuel

### Belt System Issues
- Verify belt positions exist before attempting pickup
- Ensure proper cleanup of old belt systems before rebuilding
- Create complete belt paths with proper connections

### Entity Positioning
- Use exact drop positions for inserters relative to mining drills
- Consider entity dimensions when placing adjacent structures
- Leave sufficient space between parallel production lines

### System Design
- Implement proper error handling for entity cleanup operations
- Verify entity positions are valid before attempting operations
- Monitor system status for blockages and efficiency issues
